roleset.name: having an affection or liking for something
roleset.note: FOND-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. Comparison to 'like'. (from fond.01-j)

example.name: fond-j: both args
example.text: Much as I am fond of the Royal Family if he dies I really hope we do n't end up seeing a load of scenes that would not look out of place in North Korea and a Media circus .
